verses.name: Jeremiah 37:4
verses.text: Now Jeremiah came in and went out among the people: for they had not put him into prison.

verses.name: Jeremiah 37:5
verses.text: Then Pharaoh’s army was come forth out of Egypt: and when the Chaldeans that besieged Jerusalem heard tidings of them, they departed from Jerusalem.

verses.name: Jeremiah 37:6
verses.text: Then came the word of the Lord unto the prophet Jeremiah, saying,

verses.name: Jeremiah 37:7
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord, the God of Israel; Thus shall ye say to the king of Judah, that sent you unto me to enquire of me; Behold, Pharaoh’s army, which is come forth to help you, shall return to Egypt into their own land.
